short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kills sponsored posts on Facebook Marketplace

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lightweight extension to remove sponsored posts while browsing Facebook Marketplace.

Features:
- Hides sponsored posts while browsing all (replaces 'Sponsored' text with ðŸ˜Ž)
- Hides sponsored posts embedded in specific category posts and marketplace search results
- Handy 'Kill Count' badge on extension icon to keep track of removed posts
- Nifty popup that displays removal count

**Please be aware that any updates to the structure of Facebook Marketplace may break extension functionality**

Version 1.1 Changes:
- Visual update to extension popup
- Extension no longer requires page refresh to work when navigating from other facebook.com pages
- Now hides posts instead of removing to resolve errors when Facebook loads new posts
